titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University. MS Or 33: Khulāṣat al-ḥisāb.

persName.#text: ʻĀmilī, Bahāʼ al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn, 1547-1621
عاملي، بهاء الدين محمد بن حسين،

supportDesc.extent: 30 foliated leaves : 245 x 160 (145 x 97) mm, bound to 250 x 175 mm

layoutDesc.layout: 11 long lines; extensive marginalia and interlinear comments on the first 16 folios; catchwords on verso, lower left.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻliq in black ink; pointed, unvocalized.

decoNote: Headings in red; tables (f. 3r-4r, 7v-8r, 9v, 10v) and geometrical diagrams (f. 15r/v, 18r-19r, 20v, 29r) in red and black.

binding.p: Red half leather binding, gold tooling.

origin.p: The colophon is taped over (f. 30r); an owner's stamp with the name Muḥammad ʻAlī Khān and the date A.H. 1258 is visible on f. 1r.

provenance: Formerly owned by Muḥammad ʻAlī Khān (owner's stamp f. 1r).
